Articles.Content:
Hi guys!

I am relatively new to the forums but not to the game - I have been sporadically downloading new versions of KSP since about 0.8.4

Although I have had the game for a while now I don\'t seem to play it as often as I would like though :-[

I have already achieved stable orbits a couple of times, so my next mission is to reach the Mun - I don\'t care whether I crash into it or not at first - I just want to reach it and then I will go from there. Can anyone offer some tips that may help me to send the Kerbals to the big grey rock in the sky?

My own method for reaching the mun is to create a highly elliptical orbit that touches the mun\'s orbit when i am already in a stable orbit around Kerbin. Then i timewarp and wait for my ship to come very close to the mun, and then you\'re in orbit! Then i turn my craft to point at the green circle with a small cross on the navball and fire my engines to make the orbit significantly smaller, if you keep doing that you\'ll just have to wait to smack into the Mun.

I really suck at landing though, this may derive from my stock part purism.

Also, welcome to the forums!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
